title: Mini Games on Minecraft Realms (work in progress)
author: 星E君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2014-2-18 19:22 编辑 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjc0ODcyODY4/v.swf

"Minecraft Realms" is Mojang's Minecraft server service, currently available in Sweden and with Minecon vouchers.

This video clip quickly demonstrates how you will be able to switch your Realm to a mini game, without the need of resetting your world. This feature will be included in the 1.7.5 update, coming in March 2014.

Everything is work in progress!
[groupid=532]Rev-Craft[/groupid]

replies.author: 星E君
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2014-2-18 19:28 编辑 

it means that the minecraft realms will be more easier to use than the normal server you need to rent
and 1.7.5 will comes out very soon!
